fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm admin email configuration warning
fields.request_details: Disable outbound email by clearing Django's EMAIL_BACKEND or switching to the dummy backend and ensuring no Email Outbox objects are enabled. Sign in as a superuser and load the admin dashboard. Verify the warning banner appears above the home header and includes a working "Add an Email Outbox" link. Re-enable an Email Outbox or restore the email backend and confirm the banner disappears after refreshing the dashboard.
